page.title: 13SHOPPING IN BURNESS
page.content: Because there no shops in Burness now, people do their shopping from the{ {shopping van}which is based at{ {Kettletoft Stores.}Fiona Slater drives the van. In Burness she goes to{18 {houses.}She takes the van more often to people further away from the shops (twice a week). People find the van handy because they can get most of their messages from it. It sells{ {groceries,}like tinned food, packet food & dairy products;{sweets & {crisps; fresh fruit & vegetables} (which are particularly fresh on a Wednesday after the boat comes in); & {fresh meat}orders are delivered on Thursdays. Driving the van to Fiona is really good fun. She gets on well with the people who come to the van. People speak about the weather & pass on all the local gossip.
